1 Kings or 3 Kings__02.5__Joab: : These instructions given by David to his son, with relation to Joab and Semei, proceeded not from any rancour of heart, or private pique; but from a zeal for justice, that crimes so public and heinous might not pass unpunished.
1 Kings or 3 Kings__02.6__To hell: : This word hell doth not here signify the place or state of damnation; but the place and state of the dead.
